thread.section_title: Hilton Paris Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent well run hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent well run hotel - Review of Hilton Paris Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Allendale36
title: Excellent well run hotel
text: I stayed here on business in February. Despite its central location, the rooms were quiet. The breakfast is excellent and varied. The only complaint was that the desk area for working was a little cramped. Good shower and bathroom. Spotlessly clean everywhere and helpful polite staff. Would stay agin. Building and bar are quite atmospheric
